com.jrefinery.chart
Class LinePlot

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Plot
        |
        +--com.jrefinery.chart.LinePlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
AxisChangeListener, CategoryPlot, ChartChangeListener, VerticalValuePlot
public class LinePlot
extends Plot
implements CategoryPlot, VerticalValuePlot

A Plot that displays data in the form of a line chart, using data from any class that implements the CategoryDataSource interface.

See Also:
Plot, CategoryDataSource
